articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: MS Dhoni's Record Broken! Ben Stokes Surpasses Ex-India Captain's Feat With Leeds Test Win - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Ben Stokes broke MS Dhoni's long-standing record as he led the England team to a 3-wicket victory over Australia in the Leeds Test.
articles.content: England skipper Ben Stokes made a crucial 93-run contribution to his team's triumphant performance in the third Ashes Test against Australia. The nail-biting contest in Headingley ended in England's … [+1604 chars]
